entries.content: Objections are not rejections but opportunities to gather more information.
entries.notes: Implied through the approach of handling objections as info requests

entries.content: When encountering gatekeepers or objections, ask questions to gather information rather than pushing the sale.
Asking 'who replaced them out of interest?' when told someone is no longer at the company.
If you could fix one thing about your sales process it would make your life easier, what would it be?
entries.notes: Used to engage and gather info without sounding salesy

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
